item.title: Nicole Kidman, Sandra Bullock Celebrate First Day on Set of ‘Practical Magic 2’
item.description: “The witches are back,” the ‘Babygirl’ star wrote in a heartfelt Instagram post.

item.title: ‘Practical Magic 2’: Dianne Wiest and Stockard Channing Set to Return
